text:
Here comes Trevor the tractor he's
always so busy down on the farm

plow plow the fields all day
move those crops and bales of hay and

when your works all done it's time to
have some fun

through the wind and rain and snow
that's work to do you have to go and when

your works all done it's time to have
some fun let me introduce you to my

mighty friend called Trevor
he works hard down on the farm he's also

very clever farmer George's work is hard
so Trevor is there for him to move and
shift those heavy loads did how did he manage before him plow plow the fields all day

move those crops and fail to pay and
when your works all done if I do have

some fun through the wind and rain and
snow there's work to do you have to go

and when your works all done
time to have some fun when springtime

comes he'll plow the fields and scatter
seeds all day long in summer

Trevor sprays those crops to help them
grow big and strong

when summer turns to autumn time the
crops are there to harvest its trevor's

job to cut them down so you can have
your breakfast

key change plow plow the fields all day
move those crops and bales of hay and

when your works all done it I do have
some fun through the wind and rain and
snow theres work to do you have to go
and when your works all done its time to have some fun
